event_join_success: Congratulations, You have successfully registered for a lesson

email.subject: Math lesson meeting details
email.body:
Dear {{userName}},

Your scheduled mathematics lesson meeting has been successfully created. Below are the details:

Date and Time: {{startDateTime}} to {{endDateTime}}
Join Link: {{meetingLink}}

Please click the link at the time of your meeting to join.

Best regards,
Simonas Bernotas
